app.name: Delegate Plus - Hide Groups
app.short_description: Hide groups from the ticket interface.
app.long_description: Hide groups from the ticket interface so your agents can't assign tickets to these restricted groups
app.installation_instructions: Enter the ID's of the groups you wish to hide in the field. Separate each group ID with a comma without spaces. e.g. 12345678,98765442

groups_to_hide.label: Specify specific groups to hide
groups_to_hide.helpText: Add these groups as comma seperated IDs
